text: Matilde Conesa Valls (Madrid, April 13, 1928- Madrid, March 29, 2015) was a Spanish voice actress. She is one of the most known figures in the history of radio in Spain. Her most known works are the voice of Matilde in the radio serial Matilde, Perico y Periquín, as well as the voice of Lisa in David, the gnome and the witch Avería in the program La bola de cristal, as well as an extensive career in dubbing. Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Spanish voice actors
title: Matilde Conesa
